user_instruction: 'Respond to Mark'"'"'s inquiry about the company changes. You can check out my Gmail and my working Note in Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Information on Potential Organizational Changes

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Mark has heard some rumors about upcoming organizational changes and would appreciate any clarity you can provide. Could you please share the latest official information or confirm whether any announcements are forthcoming?

You may find relevant updates or reference materials in your Gmail and in the working Note on Notion. If you could review those sources and let us know what you’re able to share, that would be immensely helpful.

Thank you very much for your time and assistance.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
